wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Creber (1901-1966) (also billed as Lewis H. Creber) was a British art director who spent his career in the United States, working on well over a hundred films and television series. He worked for the major Hollywood studio Twentieth Century Fox for much of the 1930s and 1940s.

response: The film's sets were designed by the art directors Lewis Creber and Richard Day.
